message.name: ERR_XRV_PROCESS_NAME_DUPLICATE
message.locale: An intake process named '%1s' already exists.

message.name: ERR_XRV_APPLICAGNTION_ALREADY_ASSIGNED
message.locale: The application '%1s' is already assigned to the intake process '%2s'.

message.name: ERR_FV_PROCESS_NAME_EMPTY
message.locale: An intake process name must be entered.

message.name: ERR_FV_PROCESS_DEFINITION_EMPTY
message.locale: The intake process configuration must be entered.

message.name: ERR_FV_PROCESS_NAME_CONTAINS_SPACES
message.locale: The intake process name must not contain any spaces and must be a composed of alphanumeric characters.

message.name: ERR_FV_ROLE_ASSIGNMENT_ROLE_EMPTY
message.locale: The application must be specified on the role assignment.

message.name: ERR_FV_ROLE_ASSIGNMENT_PROCESS_EMPTY
message.locale: The intake process must be specified on the role assignment.

message.name: ERR_XRV_ROLE_ALREADY_ASSIGNED
message.locale: Applications cannot be assigned to more than one intake process.

message.name: ERR_UNPUBLISHED_VERSION_ALREADY_PRESENT
message.locale: An unpublished version of this process configuration already exists, please make your modifications to that process configuration and publish your changes when complete.

message.name: ERR_MODIFICATION_ONLY_ON_PUBLISH_OR_UNPUBLISHED
message.locale: Modifications are only permitted on published and unpublished intake processes.
